name: Alps Electric
overview: ALPS Electric (USA), Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the marketing, sale, and distribution of optoelectronic, radio frequency, magnetic, and electromechanical parts and systems for communications and broadcasting, computer peripherals, and automotive markets in North America. Its products include mechatronic devices, automotive electronics, communications, and peripheral products. The companyâ€™s products also include switches/encoders, potentiometers, sensors, connectors, magnetic heads, cassette mechanisms, RF components for radio communication and broadcasting, optical components, liquid crystal displays, input devices, printers, and floppy disk drives. It serves electronics components and electronic equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Campbell, California. ALPS Electric (USA), Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Alps Electric (North America), Inc.
